description: HF - Fixed bug after adding or removing on phase table
HF - Fixed bug in adding decimal to journal report
N8940 - Showing return to triage date red when return to triage date is for today
N8618 - Fixed bug in showing release date in nugget detail
N8681 - Updated Edit column permission in Workflow table
N8908 - Show avatar image in push notification messages
N8954 - Fixed bug in updating white badge count
HF - Renamed Subscribe title to Follow in Inbox Project Nugget and Inbox Release Nugget
HF - Fixed issue with focus input on switching to Chat tab in Detail Sidebar
HF - Fixed cadence issue in Inbox Project Nuggets
HF - Sorted bad news overdue triage ascending
HF - Fixed active tab to Sort in Table Sort/Filter
N8890 - In Phase table in settings should not be shown Triage System phases
N8837 - Removed dialog shown after trying to attach video recording
N8977 - Fixed issue in inserting Journal hours to complete
N8770 - Fixed Breadcrumb smaller screen size issues
N8933 - Date before today disabled in all date pickers
N8760 - Changed the position white badge count
N8868 - Changed all date params to ISO format
N7341 - Removed Bootstrap Vue dependency
N8864 - Implemented Webpack code splitting
N8853 - Upgraded Vue and Packages
N8905 - Fixed issue in number inputs
N8854 - Add loading for all buttons

HF - Fixed issue with focus on date picker
N3625 - Clicking the down arrow in date picker should collapse it
N7794 - Fixed issue when filtering table by 'Released'
N7585 - Wrong toast message shown when creating new department
N7817 - Unnecessary scroll showing in user profile tab
N7543 - Fixed sprint drop down bugs when editing sprint name or deleting sprint
N7764 - Added new sprint icon in breadcrumb
N6002 - Users should not be able to mention non-members in private channels specifically
N7575 - Fixed possible race condition bugs when saving user profile, creating sprint, or adding new timecard
HF - Add tooltip text to the last tab in dashboard module
N7556 - Skill table in user profile settings should take up full width of screen
N7351 - System prevents creating nugget if no projects exist at all
N7632 - Moving dark mode to user profile
N7715 - Merging estimate due and upcoming estimate tabs in report module
N7816 - Only if clicking subscribe checkbox in nugget detail does selection toggle
N7631 - Badgecounts disappear when changing from public to private tab
N7813 - Loading spinner showing when removing/adding phases
HF - Most recent message sometimes not showing correctly when going to direct chat
N7338 - Only first digit was showing in birthday drop down in settings
N7528 - Cadensce sometimes not showing correctly when viewing nuggets in sprints/projects
HF - Renaming Estimate Pending to Estimating
N7149 - Pressing back button now better support to navigate back to project or sprint nuggets in dashboard
N7198 - Fixing bugs in nugget detail panel
N6802 - Adding completed tab in report module
HF - Return to triage column now always shows accurate date
N6130 - Adding estimate level to upcoming tab
HF - Clicking checkbox nested in any module table column (such as backlog checkbox in triage' would reset the scroll position of table
N7621 - completed checkbox in release detail will now only show if the release date is today (or in the past)
N7555 - Moving nugget creation button to navigation sidebar
N6431 - Cleaning code related to badge counts throughout the application
N6576 - Displaying new toast message and better behavior when user attempts to attach file > 25mb
HF -Eliminated animations that change width due to overhead caused in main thread
N7545 - Fixed sprint detail tab issues
N7420 - Improving message loading performance
HF - updating profile popup icons
HF - updating icons shown in profile popup for video conferencing
N6068 - Adding new sprint detail panel
N7444 - Resolving issue with sprint dropdown showing empty
HF - New approach to refreshing table data when real time updates happen to nuggets, assignments, etc.
N7367 - User should not be able to select date in the past for company/personal holiday
N7208 - Making change in sprint in the main application table should update sprint selection in detail panel
N5847 - When phase is deleted, resource table should disappear
N6313 - Last message not displayed correct in channels
N7087 - CorePopper bugs fixed and refractored to be standardized across the application
HF - Fix bug in navigation bar > channel badge count not incrementing when message is received sometimes
N7346 - Fixed bug where blank page is shown sometimes when trying to open dashboard module
N7466 - Assignment detail phase resources sometimes missing on first login when navigating to assignment detail tab
HF - Sometimes Assignment detail resource table was in edit mode even though the phase selected had an assignment
HF - Adding new loading animation to tables
HF - Fix remaining bugs in assingment detail
HF - Significant animation overhaul & performance boosts
hf - Increase length of time popup notifications display on desktop
N7089 - Replace deep selector with v deep projectwide
N7190 - Specialties missing in Settings > Skills
N6119 - Add button in Timecard Detail that allows users to remove zero reported journal entries
N5678 - cadence columns needed in good news production
N6734 - replace store dispatch/commit with module namespace
HF - updating row selection behavior in inbox, nugget unread & triage
N6868 - add badge count to channels
N6338 - assignment, projects, nuggets phases are now synced across sessions
HF - fixing issue with tempo filter/sort not working
N6740 - fixed style bug in settings
N6129 - assigned column color and update
HF - increased loading speed for all tabs that load assignments in assignment, good news and bad news
HF - dynamically increasing width of sprint dropdown so sprint names always fits
HF - Optimizations for chat
N4162 - Rounding tab edges
HF - Performance enhancements with loading loading table rows
HF - Removing animations to increase performance
N4100 - Upcoming is now showing nuggets instead of assignments
N4662 - Return to triage picker now does not allow user to select in past
N4179 - Fixing spacing issues when copy/pasting into chat
N4652 - Updating the popup avatar style
HF - Dolphin socket support added
N3159 - Sprint dropdown now opens from bottom to top when there is no space available
N4298 - uploading large files does not throw front-end errors anymore due to timeout
N4450 - In the Primary and secondary maestro drop-down list, show only users who have the PM role
N4578 - Detail collapse disabled in people/group chat
N2275 - Internal code cleanup
N4502 - User cannot unassign a released nugget
N4496 - Color fix on label input
N4452 - Lead resource cannot assign nugget to themselves
N4574 - The user should not be able to select past end date from selected start date during create new event for holidays
N4377 - Fixed coloring issue when selecting multiple nuggets
N4450 - show correct primary/secondary maestro for release/project drop down
N4298 - uploading larger files should not time out anymore
N4374 - emails were not showing in active row in table of Settings > Users
N4300 - Adding arrow to table in Assignment Detail allow them to collapse
N4393 - Tempo now becomes 'Released' when nugget is released
N4353 - Groups can now be both public & private in settings
N4561 - sprint drop down in team lead module changed to text column so they are read only
HF - Fixed input focus when replying to message
HF - Fixes load more spinner showing in rooms on refresh.
enabled temporary message for REPLY
Reply messages now send links
Removed Chat animations
Clear Chat Input/Reply/Edit on pressing Escape (Expands upon N4345)
Cleaned up/Fixed Attachment rendering inconsistencies
Broke ChatRooms up into modular components
Cleaned up RoomHeader CSS
Reworked 'New Message' chat banner logic
Removed directly mutating chat messages (fixes reactivity)
Focus on chat input when navigating to People/Group module
Added missing labels for Group Chat room tabs
Fixed error for undefined attachment document/media room
Temporarily fixed SEEN messages from socket not having updated isSeen/seenAt fields
Fixed no media/documents/links not displaying in empty rooms
Fixed delay in chat message (Fixes N4356)
Fixed scrolling for both sending new and reply messages (Fixes N4322)
Chat now defaults scrollbar to the bottom, fixes initial chat flickering.
N4107 - Declined nuggets show red in bad news delayed
N4448 - Fixed issue with backlog sprints not always showing
HF    - Clicking dropdowns does not change row selection
N4426 - Selected tag did not unselect when user remove tag using close icon (X)
N4346 - manually added timecard is added to correct place in list based on the date
N3711 - User profile in settings is updated
N4299 - Assignment detail tab width increased when that tab is selected
Attachment, Media, Link deployed for people, groups and nuggets
Images can be copy/pasted directly into chat
Journals should be sorted correctly
Bugs in Holidays in settings fixed
Read messages cannot be edited
Bugs in freezing/unfreezing fixed
Bugs in decline checkbox fixed
Backlog sprint tab added
Fixed badgecounts in release/projects not showing correctly on first login
Cleanup related to backend performance optimizations
Release rocket icon background color fixed and aligned
Fixed bug when trying to add skill to a user in settings
Spring dropdown now now becomes a text field for all roles except project maestro
Workflow phases can now be re-ordered using drag and drop in settings
Slightly increased font size in time shown for direct/group message list
Added deactivate tag functionality
Fixed duplicate toast error message showing when session is invalid dialog comes up
Session invalid now forces page to show the loading screen
Fixed bugs related to private rooms
audit messages for changes in nugget description or name will now show difference using strikethrough and colored background in the text
Fixing flickering happening to submodule tab due to bug in scroll bar
journals are now sorted descending
Notification badges & counts are now kept up to date at all times
Fixed bug where sprint drop down shows empty if sprint was already released
Nugget redirection to subscribed when new nugget is created
Assignment in progress badge now counts overdue/due timecards instead of all rows in that table
Added initial group messaging
Added need work in approval due
core dropdown auto selects newly created batch now
freeze and declined checkboxes now are disabled when nothing is selected
release note order reversed to show most recent at the top
secondary maestro field is now clearable
tabs and shift tab keys now work properly in drop downs
Fixing double flicker bug in assignment detail phases when selecting different nugget
Hiding goodnews & badnews for lead resources
Cleaning audit messages
Added missing features that allows for modifying phases in the settings page
Cadensce background adjusted based on if the phase is assigned or deleted
Added release note page
Added decline feature in nugget assignment
Added pagination to all our tables
Target date now automatically generated for triage todo phase
Chat messages with multiple attachment now only have the first attachment show the message itself (N3269)
Nicolas Cage has been deplatformed and replaced by our standard chat avatar
Initial settings page has been developed
Given nugget name column a minimum width as it would disappear on mobile
Fix default selection & edit mode default in assignment detail
Changes related to improving CI/CD deployment pipeline
Fix minor bugs in timecard detail when nugget title over-extends
Initial routing of settings button
Dark mode changed to default
Chat slidebar does not dismiss anymore after clicking outside of it
Rename of timecard to journal
Adjusted table header font size to match our standard app font
Added 'New Nugget' button and nugget creation dialog
Fixes bugs in overdue triage save not working correctly
Adjusted checkbox color box after feedback designer feedback
Checkbox values are now saving correctly for all submodule tables. For example, 'extend' nugget & 'approve' nugget is now working
Timecard renamed to Journal
Added date localization in Return to triage column. It will now show dd/mm/yyyy or mm/dd/yyyy depending on browser region
Fixed last few problems with batch drop down
Detail panel size increased by 10%
Adding edit mode in resource assignment detail panel
Adding freeze nugget function in time card detail panel
Removing transition animations happening in between sub module and detail panel selections
Added floating discard button next to the floating save button that was released this week
Fixed few minor bugs with batch combo not resetting & sometimes not showing the correct batch name
Added 'create project' button in top right corner of the screen. Only shows when Project module is selected
Fix bug where detail detailsidebar always shows when login from mobile
Fix performance issue happening when selecting a nugget and delay when the row gets highlighted.
Fix bug in batch creation dialog sometimes not closing on save
Added floating 'save' button in the buttom right corner of all submodule panels that will appear when data is savable.
Batch/return to triage operations for multiple nuggets can be queued and saved all at once
75% completion of assignment
75% completion of timecard
75% completion of batching
initial push of assignment
initial push of timecard
initial push of batching
Updated browser tab icon
Moved Project Nuggets from Nugget module to Projects Module

timecard table merged
